resources.string: 1) What programming language concept does C++ have available which is not available in Java programming, which deals specifically with memory locations?
2) What main trait of Java programming makes it desirable over other programming languages?
4) If coding HTML in a notepad after declaring the doctype what is the starting tag?
5) In object oriented programming which instance of Polymorphism does not allow the compiler to determine methods to be executed but it is determined during run time?
6) In Java programming what basic concept of Object Oriented programming is elicited by the use of the keyword: extends
7) Which primitive variable below can store a decimal value?
8) In Java programming what is the purpose of an array container object?
9) An ArrayList can be dynamic at declaration.
10) In Java which Loop Type is tested after the execution of the interior code before it determines if it will loop again?
It will draw a ray or a straight line
It will allow conversions of one data type to another
It will store a fixed number of values
It will compare two primitive data values
